name: fka/awesome-chatgpt-prompts
description: The fka/awesome-chatgpt-prompts dataset is a comprehensive collection of text-based conversation starters designed for interaction with the ChatGPT model. This dataset serves as a valuable resource for users seeking to engage in a wide range of discussions, from general topics to specific use cases, fostering engaging and informative text-based conversations
